dialogue: Oh, wow! The interns really are in â€“ and they're hotter than ever! But hang on, how did we end up with you?
-sigh- I'm only here for the day. The boss has asked me to get his coffee.
Well, that's going to be a challenge. Coffee machine is busted.
Can you fix it for me?
Every summer, there's a bit of a competition among the staff, to see who can collect the intern's underpants.
Ew. No. No, the chick from the photo.
Right. I'm more of a tit guy, but I can't lose three summers in a row. I want her panties! Bring me those, I'll fix the coffee machine for you.
